mapper.select: SELECT t.id AS id, t.FromUInfoid AS fromuinfoid, t.ToUInfoid AS touinfoid, t.TradeDate AS tradedate, t.state AS state, t.Goodsid AS goodsid FROM trade t WHERE t.id = #{id} AND t.del_flag = '0'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO trade ( id, FromUInfoid, ToUInfoid, TradeDate, state, Goodsid ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{fromuinfoid}, #{touinfoid}, #{tradedate}, #{state}, #{goodsid} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE trade
id = #{id},
FromUInfoid = #{fromuinfoid},
ToUInfoid = #{touinfoid},
TradeDate = #{tradedate},
state = #{state},
Goodsid = #{goodsid}
WHERE id = #{id}
